alert.note: Alert for Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ware County through 530 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Braganza, or 12 miles south of Waycross, moving slowly northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Ware County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
